    manyROC – tools for ROC analyis

    The developement version of the package.

    Notes:

    1. ROC – receiver operating characteristic.
    2. In documentation, symbol
      ​​​
       means, that the desctription is not finished or imprecise and still needs to be reviewed.

    Install package:

    library(devtools)
install_github("GegznaV/manyROC")
